name: Automotation workflow + emails prototypes
description:
Hi y'all,


My group and I are working on a Digital Marketing Plan for our start-up. We were wondering whether you guys can helps us out with some feedback. We really would like to know if we can improve the workflow and whether this will be a working workflow. Also we would appreciate your opinion about the content and lay-out of the e-mails created.


Thanks in advance :)
